articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Iranian President Hassan Rouhani on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 Kim in the message said that the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran was a historic event that brought about the fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Iranian people to lead an independent life free from all domination and subjugation.
					
					 He sincerely wished the president and people of Iran greater success in their work for independent development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Iran with long history and traditions would grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian FM
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Tuesday sent a message of greeting to his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 The message sincerely wished the Iranian foreign minister greater success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to the deep concern and joint efforts of both sides.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Tuesday to mark the day of diplomats in Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Ui Chun and Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
Beijing, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China had a meeting in Beijing on Feb. 10 to adopt a congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, the chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and Koreans in China.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Chinese Embassy Officials Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Chinese Embassy Officials Held
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs gave a friendly meeting with staff members of the Chinese embassy here Tuesday on the occasion of New Year, Juche 103 (2014).
					 Present there on invitation were Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai and his embassy officials.
					
					 Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Jun and other officials of the ministry were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The participants deepened friendly feelings, talking with each other about boosting the traditional relations of DPRK-China friendship and cooperation.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Here
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here on Tuesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Arrive
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Arrive
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans arrived here on Tuesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They included a delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Thae Sok Sin, department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, a delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Jong Chi Un, department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and a delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Kim Svetlana, branch head of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan.

articles.title: Meeting of Agricultural Workers Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Agricultural Workers Held
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting of agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place here on Tuesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the union, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il brought about epochal changes unprecedented in the national history spanning five thousand years in all fields of politics, military affairs, economy and culture with his energetic leadership and revolutionary practice for a long period.
					
					 Under his wise guidance the fields of co-op farms were face-lifted, nature-driven waterways built and the mass movement such as socialist emulation made headway, bringing about a decisive turn in agricultural production, they noted.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un opened a new chapter for accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader and consolidated the single-minded unity of the party and revolutionary ranks in every way, providing a sure guarantee for successfully carrying out the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They called on agricultural workers and members of the union to devotedly carry out the agricultural policies of the party in hearty response to the letter sent by Kim Jong Un to the participants in the National Conference of Subworkteam Leaders in the Agricultural Sector.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the Central Committee of the union and its officials in Pyongyang and agricultural workers.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Koreans in China
Beijing, February 10 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in Beijing on Feb. 10 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, the chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, Koreans in China and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China.
					
					 In such numbers as narration and chorus "The Embrace of My Motherland", an immortal masterpiece, female solo "Our Hearts Follow the Leader", male chorus "I Will Remain Your Son Forever" male solo "Ardent Desire" and dance "Great Joy" the performers vividly represented ardent longing for Kim Jong Il and deep reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance ended with chorus "Our Leader Loved by People". It was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulated on His Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulated on His Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front issued a statement on Feb. 10 to congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un on his nomination as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, according to the website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu type, is the great leader of the nation who is opening up a wide avenue of eternal prosperity of the country and the nation with the same ideology, leadership ability, rare wisdom and noble virtues as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, the supreme incarnation of the noble moral obligation, provided a new chapter for carrying forward the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leaders, thereby upholding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the great Paektusan nation and demonstrating the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea shining with their ideas and winning victories by dint of their exploits.
					
					 In the New Year Address Kim Jong Un appealed to all the Koreans to open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. In the crucial proposal and the open letter of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK he brightly indicated the principles and ways for opening the wide road for improving the north-south relations.
					
					 As Kim Jong Un leads the cause of national reunification and correctly indicates the way to be followed by the nation, we have bright today and are confident of brighter tomorrow.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition "The great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the ever-victorious banner of our revolution" opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture here on Tuesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the exhibition hall is a photo of Kim Jong Il wishing the great Paektusan nation eternal prosperity with a bright smile on his face.
					
					 Also seen there are photos dealing with the glorious revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, who made immortal contributions to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of national reunification and the human cause of independence.
					
					 On display there are photos showing the great traits of Kim Jong Il, who strengthened the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of President Kim Il Sung and created a new history of realizing the cause of perpetuating the memory of Kim Il Sung and photos dealing with Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership feats.
					
					 Also displayed are photos showing the personality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as great man who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il by wisely leading the work to model the whole party and society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Other photos vividly represent the stirring reality of Songun Korea where all its service personnel and people are enthusiastically making a fresh leap forward to usher in a period of its great prosperity.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam made an opening address. 
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants went round the exhibition.

articles.title: 5th National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
articles.content:
5th National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The 5th National Pencil Drawing Festival opened with due ceremony at the National Theatre on Monday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Presented to the festival were at least 350 drawings created by service personnel and painters, people from all walks of life and school youth and children across the country.
					
					 Placed in the centre of the venue of the festival are paintings "Visiting Fields of Bumper Crops" and "Happy Soldiers Visited by the General," which depict President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among those paintings presented to the festival are paintings "Sharp-cut Cliff on Mt. Osong, Mountain of Songun" and "Morning in February," which deal with the undying feats of Kim Jong Il, who defended the socialist country under the uplifted banner of Songun and laid the eternal foundation for the prosperity of Juche Korea.
					
					 Paintings "Along the Track of Love", "Delight of Making Big Fish Hauls" and "Joy in July" represent the happy life the Korean people are enjoying under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also among those paintings are works reflecting the drive of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to bring earlier a final victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of working people's organizations, officials concerned, painters, working people and school youth and children.
					
					 Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam made an opening address.

articles.title: Subworkteam Management System in DPRK
articles.content:
Subworkteam Management System in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The national conference of subworkteam leaders in the agricultural sector was held successfully in the DPRK. 
					 The conference underscored the need for the subworkteam leaders to bring into full play the advantages of the subworkteam management system, in order to carry out the theses on the socialist rural question in the country.
					
					 The subworkteam management system created by President Kim Il Sung is an excellent form of production organization and a good method of management which encourages farmers to take part in production and management in a responsible manner, attaching themselves to the collective economy.
					
					 One day in May Juche 54 (1965), Kim Il Sung went to Phochon-ri, Hoeyang County, Kangwon Province. 
					
					 There he acquainted himself with farming, living conditions and management situation of workteams and subworkteams of the farm. 
					
					 As workteam leaders had many people to deal with and many things to do, they were unable to properly manage manpower and production of their workteams.
					
					 Evaluation on labor was mostly done in an equal way, failing to enhance farmers' production zeal.
					
					 That was the reason for low grain yield in the farm.
					
					 The same was true for other farms.
					
					 On the basis of deep analysis of the farm's situation, he found out that the subworkteam management system was suitable for group's working, instead of the workteam management system.
					
					 He saw to it that the subworkteam management system was introduced first in some co-op farms in Kangwon and other provinces.
					
					 Then, at the 12th Plenary Meeting of the 4th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea held in November Juche 54 (1965), he took measures to apply it to all other co-op farms throughout the country.
					
					 With the introduction of the system, the guidance and management system over the socialist rural communities was orderly established from grassroots units to state-level organs, which served as an impetus to bringing about upsurge in agricultural production.

articles.title: DPRK Takes Positive Measures to Prevent Influenza
articles.content:
DPRK Takes Positive Measures to Prevent Influenza
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- It has been reported that A (H1N1) influenza has rapidly spread throughout the world, claiming an increase of victims.
					 The influenza is an acute respiratory epidemic characterized by fever, cough, throat pain and other symptoms.
					
					 The DPRK government has taken a series of measures to prevent the influenza.
					
					 Medical organs have paid special attention to health conditions of the old and the patients with chronic diseases.
					
					 People are advised to observe the rules of health in order to prevent themselves from being infected with the virus.
					
					 They are also encouraged to brush their teeth with 3-5 percent brine at least three times a day and take garlic sap on a normal basis.
					
					 Airports, harbors and border railway stations have strengthened quarantine inspection to prevent the influenza from coming into the country.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closes
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The 19th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions closed with due ceremony at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday. It opened on Jan. 23.
					 The players competed in five events, divided into four groups.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Ministry of Railways, General Bureau of Pleasure Park and Mansudae Art Studio won the title in the women's basketball event while the Ministry of Railways, Foreign Trade Bank, Taesong Guidance Bureau and Mansudae Art Studio came first in the men's basketball event.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Foreign Trade Bank, Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and Mansudae Art Studio took the first in the women's volleyball event.      The Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, Foreign Trade Bank, Taehung Guidance Bureau and Mansudae Art Studio became winners in the men's volleyball event.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Ministry of Electric Power Industry, Maritime Administration of the DPRK and Foreign Languages Publishing House came first in the Taekwon-Do matches. The Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries, Ministry of Food Procurement and Administration, Taesong Bank and Central Broadcasting Committee of Korea took the first in the table tennis matches while the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Foreign Trade, Taehung Guidance Bureau and Mansudae Art Studio won the tug-of-war event.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Ministry of Railways, Foreign Trade Bank, and Mansudae Art Studio placed first in total points.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials and players of commissions, ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Preparations for Int'l Figure Skating Festival Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Int'l Figure Skating Festival Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival have gained momentum in the DPRK.
					 The festival is an annual event to mark the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), leader Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					
					 The venue of the festival is being decorated with various colors of electric lighting, with its equipment and facilities updated. 
					
					 Figure skating coaches and creators of the Mass Gymnastic Production Company are directing big efforts to preparing all programs on a high level.
					
					 Sportswear has also been remodeled in a fashionable way.
					
					 Meanwhile, figure skaters are further intensifying training to perform high-grade movements.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Chol Un, an official concerned, told KCNA:
					
					 The upcoming festival is expected to be bigger than the previous one.
					
					 Figure skaters from Russia, Belarus, Italy, Uzbekistan and other countries have made applications for the festival. Most of them have proved successful at national and international tournaments.
					
					 The festival will also include a demonstration performance by DPRK and foreign players. 
					
					 The festival will run from Feb. 15 to 17.

articles.title: Loach Soup Gains Popularity in DPRK
articles.content:
Loach Soup Gains Popularity in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House some days ago.
					 The competition, sponsored by the Korean Association of Cooks, drew more than 200 cooks from 40 public catering units in provinces and municipalities and under ministries and national institutions.
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes in the competition was a loach soup. 
					
					 From olden times in Korea, the soup has been considered to be one of cuisines that help people energize themselves.
					
					 Loach is believed to be rich in nutritive substances, including protein, calcium, iron and vitamin A.
					
					 It is especially efficacious for liver protection.
					
					 Loach soup, mixed with bracken, parsley, mushroom, is highly absorbable.
					
					 The participants cooked it in their own peculiar ways with beef, green pepper, parsley, pumpkin, etc. added.
					
					 The soup presented by cooks from the Changgwangsan Hotel was highly appreciated at the competition.

articles.title: DPRK People Filled with Ardent Yearning for Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
DPRK People Filled with Ardent Yearning for Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's yearning for leader Kim Jong Il is getting stronger with the approach of his birthday (Feb. 16), the Day of the Shining Star.
					 Songs representing their gratitude to him are very popular, reminding the people of his devoted efforts and undying feats for their happiness.
					
					 Among those songs is "Thanks to the Fatherly General" created in Juche 95 (2006). It vividly reflects the people's heartfelt gratitude to the leader, who devoted his whole life to their wellbeing, braving manifold hardships.
					
					 Kim Jong Il spared nothing for the people's happiness in his lifetime, carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven. Therefore, all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK have respected him as their father and mental mainstay.
					
					 He made a long journey of military inspection and field guidance to defend the country's security and provide the people with better living conditions. Such journey continued regardless of weather conditions and holidays. In his lifetime, he visited more than 14 290 units, covering over 669 800 km.
					
					 Deeply moved by his self-sacrificing devotion, all the people of the country are very grateful to him with deep reverence.
					
					 The song "Thanks to the Fatherly General" shows their strong will to hold him in high esteem forever.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Wrecker of Peace in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Wrecker of Peace in Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The commander-in-chief of the U.S. armed forces in the Pacific recently said that the DPRK should not be allowed to pose a nuclear and missile threat to south Korea and the world. Similar reckless remarks are heard from officials of the U.S. administration, too.
					 At present, an atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations is prevailing in the Korean Peninsula thanks to the DPRK's sincere efforts.
					
					 Accordingly, such accusations are nothing but a trick to divert elsewhere the attention of the world public supporting the DPRK's measures for improved north-south relations and throw a snag in the way of their development. They are also aimed to provide a favorable circumstance for the realization of the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy by keeping up the military tension in the peninsula.
					
					 Upset by the DPRK's active measures, the U.S. is getting more vociferous about "nuclear threat from north Korea" than ever before, but it is a foolish act.
					
					 As evidenced by its recent crucial proposal and open letter to the south Korean authorities, steadfast is the DPRK's will to put an end to the history of national division and confrontation, forced by the foreign forces, with united efforts of the Koreans and defend the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The nuclear threat in the peninsula has come from the U.S. through history, and it is none other than the entire Korean nation that has suffered from it.
					
					 This is intensively illustrated by the recent developments. The U.S. sent formations of nuclear-capable bombers into the sky above the West Sea of Korea for a nuclear striking rehearsal just when an inter-Korean Red Cross working contact was taking place for the reunion of separated families and their relatives.
					
					 Most of those separated families are victims of the U.S. blackmail wth atomic bomb made during the 1950-1953 Korean War. Therefore, how can they share feelings of kinship with each other in peace under U.S. nukes which may be dropped any moment, and how can the situation of the Korean Peninsula be led to peace and stability?
					
					 History and facts clearly show that the U.S. never wants to see peaceful atmosphere in the peninsula or to have the Korean nation's demands met, but only seeks the realization of its domination strategy and an excuse to provoke a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. is the very one that disturbs the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation and wrecks the peace and stability in the peninsula.
					
					 Its story about "nuclear threat from north Korea" will further reveal its true colors as a peace breaker and a nuclear war provocateur.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education through Revolutionary Sites
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education through Revolutionary Sites
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial calls for strengthening the educational work through the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites to glorify forever the ever-victorious history of the Juche revolution as required by the on-going vigorous ideological campaign.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) are the historic root which ushered in the origin of the Korean revolution and the source of the indestructible power firmly guaranteeing the victory of the revolutionary cause.
					
					 The revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites are the eternal treasures of the revolution and important bases for education in revolutionary traditions as they implicate the revolutionary history of the WPK.
					
					 They have greater influence than hundreds of words in educating the masses as they are associated with the immortal revolutionary history and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the fighting spirit of the revolutionary forerunners who pulled through the grim tempest of the revolution under the guidance of the leader.
					
					 The present situation in which the rising generation who did not experience the ordeals of revolution is becoming the main force of the revolutionary ranks and huge tasks are cropping up calls for further deepening the education in revolutionary traditions than ever before.
					
					 In order to strengthen the single-minded unity centered on the leader in every way and accelerate the final victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the party, it is necessary to put greatest efforts to education in revolutionary traditions. Herein lies the way for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Erase Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Erase Past Crimes: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- No matter how hard Japan may try to deny its past crimes and distort the truth of history, it can never write off history nor sweep the past crimes out of the memory of humankind, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Japan has gone beyond the tolerance limit in denying past crimes including forcible drafting and the sexual slavery and distorting history, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seem to calculate that their farce based on lies and far-fetched assertions will cause confusion in the understanding of history by the international community and create an atmosphere favorable for their moves for overseas expansion.
					
					 Their intention is to inspire the ambition to avenge defeat and launch invasion, not the guilty conscience for the past crimes, among the Japanese and cultivate the spirit of Japan dating back to the imperialist period.
					
					 Recently they openly paid visit to Yasukuni Shrine and cried out for rebuilding "strong Japan" despite condemnation of the world public. The sole purpose sought by them in denying the past crimes and distorting history is to launch reinvasion.
					
					 Japan's past crimes are still fresh in the memory of those who fell victim to the Japanese imperialists' aggression.
					
					 Japan should not run reckless to revive militarism but properly face up to history, though belatedly.
					
					 The present Japanese government is not properly repenting of the hideous crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past but is keeping to the path of militarism and increasingly lurching to the right, while going against history and justice. This will result in making Japan rejected as ever as a hostile country by the international community.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S. Hideous Criminal State
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S. Hideous Criminal State
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kyodo News of Japan recently said that the U.S. conducted the field test of biological weapons several times early in the 1960s. It was reported that the U.S. scattered rice-plant fever germs in the air and collected data on the speed of germ spread in rice fields.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. field test was aimed to deal a decisive strike at the food production in other countries in a bid to monopolize food and, on its basis, realize its strategy for world domination at any cost.
					
					 It has persistently pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK by already using even bio-chemical weapons in the1950s, pursuant to its own logic that in order to dominate the world it is necessary to stifle first of all the DPRK, the gateway to Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. conducted the field test of biological weapons by rice-plant fever germ which has negative effect on the production of rice, the main staple food of the Asian people, even in the postwar. This means that food safety and vital rights of the people of Korea and other Asian countries were exposed to a grave threat of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is gravely threatening the DPRK with bio-chemical weapons by deploying many bio-chemical weapons and special units in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is the source of all evils in the world as it unhesitatingly threatens even the food safety and vital rights of other nations, not content with encroaching upon the dignity and sovereignty of other countries and nations by using bio-chemical weapons even in alien lands.
					
					 The U.S. should be sternly tried by justice and human conscience at the international human rights court as criminal harassing peace and security of the world, kingpin of human rights abuse and special-class criminal state standing in the way of the prosperity of humankind.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Halt Racket for Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Halt Racket for Confrontation with Compatriots
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Feb. 9 urging the south Korean authorities to stop the racket for confrontation with compatriots.
					 The statement fully supported the statement issued by the spokesman for the Political Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission on Feb. 6.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should take a responsible attitude for the nation to solve the issues for peace and prosperity common to the north and the south, keeping pace with initiative steps put forward by the DPRK, far from doing harm to the compatriots while foolishly insisting on the "theory of maintaining principle", the statement said, adding:
					
					 Dialogue and war drills for aggression, and reconciliation and confrontation can never go down each other.
					
					 The Koreans in China warn the south Korean authorities to put an end to such racket for confrontation as answering the warm sincerity of compatriots with evil words and deeds and responding the proposal for reconciliation with hostile war drills and nuclear blackmail.
					
					 We expressed belief that south Korean politicians and those aspiring after peace and reunification would give full play to the efforts of the people until the south Korean chief executive behaves properly.
					
					 The Koreans in China will more dynamically turn out in the drive to pave a wide avenue for improving the inter-Korean relations by concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: U.S. Denounced for Insisting on Advance Step for Denuclearization of DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Denounced for Insisting on Advance Step for Denuclearization of DPRK
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is deceiving the world public by insisting on the advance step for denuclearization in the DPRK.
					 The U.S. authorities describe the DPRK's nuclear force for self-defence as a major cause of instability in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says: 
					
					 It is illogic for the U.S. to talk about the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK as it holds a stockpile of thousands of nuclear weapons and has deployed huge nuclear strike means targeting the DPRK from the air, land and sea.
					
					 Disclosing the aim sought by the U.S. in making the rhetoric about the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK timed to coincide with Pyongyang's just and crucial proposal, the commentary says:
					
					 The U.S. intends to chill the warm atmosphere being created on the Korean Peninsula for detente and dialogue thanks to the DPRK's bold and positive initiative for peace, and cover up its true colors as a chief criminal who caused the nuclear issue on the peninsula.
					
					 Another aim of the Obama administration is to translate into reality the policy of dominating the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of the non-existent "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 Washington thinks that it should ensure the overwhelming military supremacy to consolidate its domination over the region where world powers are situated.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle military exercises planned by the U.S. from late February to April aim at the military domination over this region. They are, in essence, a test nuclear war and a preliminary war for a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The situation prevailing in the region is so grave that nobody knows when a nuclear war will break out due to the reckless U.S. war drills.
					
					 The culprit disturbing peace and security on the peninsula is none other than the U.S.

articles.title: Heavy Snowfall Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Heavy Snowfall Hits S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Heavy snowfall hit different parts of south Korea, causing damage, according to KBS of south Korea Monday.
					 It snowed heavily in Kangrung, Tonghae, Sokcho and various other places of south Korean Kangwon Province.
					
					 Snow registered 118cm on Jinbu Pass, in particular.
					
					 Schools in Ryongdong area were closed or postponed their opening with bus service being suspended.
					
					 Buildings collapsed in five cities and counties, North Kyongsang Province, causing 1.4 billion won worth of damage.
					
					Schools have been closed and flight service hindered in Ulsan.

articles.title: Crucial Proposal of DPRK Supported by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Crucial Proposal of DPRK Supported by Foreign Political Parties
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Germany, Britain and DR Congo released statements on Jan. 25 and 30 in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the crucial proposal made by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The Communist Party of Germany in its statement fully supported the proposal for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and the crucial proposal sent by the NDC of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities.
					
					 It said:
					
					 We welcome the DPRK's goal for the denuclearization in the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We express sympathy with its stand calling for removing all the nukes deployed in the peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 We hope the Korean people would register bigger successes in their movement for national reunification.
					
					 The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) stated:
					
					 The world will soon clearly get to know who hopes for peace in the Korean peninsula and who does not.
					
					 The DPRK has taken practical measures for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and set forth reasonable proposals for putting an end to the country's division.
					
					 The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) is convinced that Korea will be reunified in the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The Workers' Party of DR Congo said the crucial proposal made by the NDC of the DPRK is of great significance in achieving Korea's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation free from foreign interference.
					
					 The Korean people will surely achieve the country's reunification, foiling all the moves of the U.S. and other anti-reunification forces.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in India
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in India
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in New Delhi on February 5.
					 Sitaram Yechury, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events such as meeting and seminar to praise the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in accomplishing the global cause of independence on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Political Figure of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Political Figure of DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the DR Congo who is chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, issued a statement on February 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 He said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung ushered in the era of independence and thereby the distress-torn popular masses proudly emerged masters of their own destiny and the driving force of development of history.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea which clarifies that the popular masses are masters of revolution and construction and push ahead with them, and liberated Korea through the armed struggle against Japanese imperialism.
					
					 He founded the DPRK, the country of the people, and strengthened it.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the immortal Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung into a great guiding idea in the era of independence and cemented the single-minded unity with Kim Il Sung as the monolithic center by proclaiming the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published historic works including "Socialism Is a Science" in the closing period of the 20th century when the imperialists became more vocal criticizing socialism by taking advantage of the collapse of the east European socialist countries and thus instilled great confidence and encouragement into the popular masses of the whole world.
					
					 The outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, who defended socialist Korea, the beacon of hope of the progressive humankind, and humbled U.S. imperialism engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices with the treasured sword of Songun, left a great trace in the global cause of independence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the minds of the world oppressed popular masses as they ushered in the era of independence, the new era of history, and glorified socialist Korea.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- There took place a lecture in Serbia, round-table talks in Ethiopia and film show in Malaysia on Feb. 3 and 4 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia noted in the lecture:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great statesman, peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun and benevolent father of people, who made undying contributions to the human cause of independence.
					
					 He dedicated his whole life to leading the Korean revolution pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed commander and legendary hero, to victory and glory.
					
					 One of the greatest exploits performed by him is that he formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as an integrated system of idea, theory and method of Juche and turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 Although he passed away, the exploits performed by him on behalf of the era and history will shine for all ages.
					
					 The chief designer of an Ethiopian metal and machinery company noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's birth marked a historic event that promised the bright future of Korea.
					
					 He devoted his all to carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung, regarding it as his life-time mission.
					
					 The general director of the Malaysian Y.S.P. Industries Co. Ltd. praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent statesman with extraordinary wisdom and outstanding leadership ability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Figures of Bangladesh and Myanmar issued statements on February 4 and 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerless statesman and iron-willed commander who comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and remarkably bolstered the national power of socialist Korea with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 He smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK by dint of Songun and turned the DPRK into an invincible power and nuclear weapons state, making an immortal contribution to accomplishing the global cause of independence.
					
					 The general director of a Myanmar publishing house said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great leader and benevolent father of the Korean people, who was born in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu and made the toughest forced march till the last moments of his life for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 By carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung, he thoroughly applied Kim Il Sung's idea to the revolution and construction, developing the party, state and army of the DPRK into the party, state and army of the leader and putting the dignity of the nation and the power of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 We are sure that the great idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be certainly accomplished under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Kuwait, Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Personages of Kuwait, Malaysia
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- There took place round-table talks in Kuwait and Malaysia on Jan. 29 and Feb. 1 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were figures of the Kuwait House of Works, the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association and the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia.
					
					 Yousef Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, said:
					
					 The DPRK has emerged a political and military power thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by H.E. Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On my visit to the DPRK I came to know well about the faith and will of the Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK has made sincere efforts to improve the north-south relations and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Korean people's just cause is sure to win thanks to the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general director of the M.K.P. Company of Malaysia noted:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il was a great statesman who led the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 It is surprising that the DPRK has defended socialism from the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle it.
					
					 It is a brilliant fruition of the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Il with far-sighted wisdom, extraordinary leadership ability and matchless courage and grit.
					
					 I wish the heroic Korean people greater success in building a thriving socialist country under the leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Lao, Palestinian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Lao, Palestinian Media
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Papers of Laos and a magazine of Palestine carried special write-ups between Jan. 27 and Feb. 5 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Laotian paper Pasason in an article titled "Undying exploits performed in accomplishing global cause of independence" said:
					
					 History does not know such a great man as Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits for the human cause of independence with greatest idea and leadership ability.
					
					 He gave perfect answers to strategic and tactical matters arising in leading to victory the people's struggle to build a new independent world.
					
					 He led to victory the human cause of independence with his outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 What is the most important one of the exploits he performed by triumphantly advancing the global cause of independence is that he firmly protected socialism in the DPRK and the global peace and security, smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of progressives as he made undying contributions to the global cause of independence.
					
					 Other Laotian papers Vatelao, Vientiane Mai, Congtap Pasason Lao and Heng Ngan carried articles introducing the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by successfully leading the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence under the uplifted banner of independence and Songun.
					
					 The Palestinian magazine Ilal Amam in an article titled "White snow and Kim Jong Il" praised the revolutionary career of the peerlessly great man, who was born in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu and dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Senegales e Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Senegalese Paper
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was carried by the Senegalese paper Le Populaire on February 5.
					 The paper carried his photo.

articles.title: French Organization Accuses Japan of Its Moves to Revive Militarism
articles.content:
French Organization Accuses Japan of Its Moves to Revive Militarism
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The France-Korean Friendship Association posted an article on its website on Feb. 3 denouncing Japan for its moves to distort history and revive militarism. 
					 The article noted Japan has become evermore undisguised in its moves to distort history and revive militarism, as evidenced by Prime Minister Abe's visit to Yasukuni Shrine and the decision of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology to describe Tok islets as "part of the inalienable territory of Japan" in the "explanation of study guidebook", which would serve as guidelines for editing textbooks for junior and senior high schools.
					
					 All Koreans and the Chinese people are condemning Japan as the very one causing instability in the region by negating the crimes committed by it in the past, the article said, adding:
					
					 Japan is an arch criminal triggering off conflicts by zealously perpetrating militaristic provocations in the East Asian region. 
					
					 We urge Japan to reflect on its past crimes and make reparations to the Koreans and other Asian people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje a Hassan Rouhani, presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran para felicitar el 35o aniversario de la victoria de la Revolucion Islamica de este pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente subrayo que la victoria de la Revolucion Islamica de Iran sirvio de un acontecimiento historico que trajo un cambio radical en la forja del destino del pueblo irani que queria gozar de una vida independiente, librandose de todo tipo de la dominacion y la subyugacion.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de larga historia y tradicion entre ambos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en todas las esferas y deseo de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en el trabajo para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Inaugurada foto-exposicion central por 16 de Febrero
articles.content:
Inaugurada foto-exposicion central por 16 de Febrero
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo inaugurada el dia 11 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la foto-exposicion central intitulada "Gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo es la bandera invencible de nuestra revolucion".
					En el lugar fue colocada una foto del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa bendiciendo el radiante futuro de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Tambien se ven las otras alusivas a la vida gloriosa y revolucionaria de el quien acumulo inmortal contribucion en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la reunificacion de la patria y la empresa de la independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Y hubo otras relativas a los nobles rasgos y hazanas de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun del Dirigente que fortalecio el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como el del Presidente Kim Il Sung y preparo la nueva historia para la realizacion de la causa de eternidad del lider.
					
					Ademas, fueron exhibidas las fotos del Mariscal Kim Jong Un que al dirigir sabiamente las labores por transformar todo el partido y toda la sociedad segun Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, realiza de modo brillante la idea y la causa del Dirigente.
					
					Se exhibieron tambien las otras alusivas a la realidad de la patria en salto y el entusiasmo de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de abrir la era dorada de Corea del Songun.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios junto con trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron el lugar de exposicion.

articles.title: ACNC acusa a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y seguridad
articles.content:
ACNC acusa a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y seguridad
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el comandante en jefe de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico dijo que "es intolerable la amenaza nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea al Sur de Corea y el resto del mundo". De la administracion norteamericana salen tambien tales disparates. 
					Lo problematico es que estas palabras salen en estos momentos en que va preparandose en la Peninsula Coreana el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas gracias a los sinceros esfuerzos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Es la expresion de la artimana tendente a poner obstaculos en el avance de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur desviando la atencion de la opinion publica mundial que apoya las medidas de la RPDC por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					EE.UU. intenta mantener la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana y preparar el ambiente favorable al cumplimiento de su estrategia de hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					EE.UU., aturdido por las activas medidas de la RPDC, insiste mas que nunca en la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea", pero en vano.
					
					Como muestran la propuesta importante y la carta abierta del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, es invariable su voluntad de poner fin con las fuerzas unidas nacionales a la historia de division y enfrentamiento causada por las fuerzas extranjeras y de defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Historicamente, la amenaza nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana proviene de EE.UU. Y la victima es precisamente toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Lo demuestra intensivamente la situacion actual. Hace poco, se realizo el contacto de trabajo de la cruz roja entre ambas partes coreanas para el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados. En aquel entonces, EE.UU. recurrio a los ejercicios de ataque nuclear movilizando las escuadrillas de cazabombarderos nucleares en el espacio sobre el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					Al tomar en consideracion que la mayoria de los participantes en el encuentro mencionado fueron separados forzosamente por el chantaje de bombas atomicas de EE.UU., como podrian compartir el sentimiento fraternal bajo las bombas nucleares de EE.UU. y como la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se dirigira a la paz y la estabilidad. 
					
					La historia y la realidad demuestran que EE.UU. no tiene interes en el ambiente pacifico de la Peninsula Coreana ni en la demanda de la nacion coreana, sino requiere solo el pretexto favorable al cumplimiento de su estrategia hegemonica y al estallido de guerra nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. es el autor que obstaculiza la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y perturba la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El rumor de "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea" revela mas la naturaleza de EE.UU. como perturbador de la paz y provocador de la guerra nuclear.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a intensificar educacion en tradiciones revolucionarias
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a  intensificar educacion en tradiciones revolucionarias
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el editorial de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun llama a intensificar la educacion a traves de los campos de batalla revolucionaria y los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario conforme a la demanda de la realidad en que se realiza activamente la campana ideologica para glorificar generacion tras generacion la historia victoriosa de la revolucion del Juche. 
					Las tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dieron origen a la revolucion coreana y garantizan con firmeza la victoria de la causa revolucionaria, adelanta el editorial y continua:
					
					Los campos de batalla revolucionaria y los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario son las importantes bases para la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias y eternos patrimonios de la revolucion donde esta implicada la historia revolucionaria del PTC.
					
					Son mas influyentes que las palabras en la educacion de las masas populares, porque alli estan impregnados la imborrable historia revolucionaria y las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y el espiritu de lucha de los martires revolucionarios que superaron todas las pruebas de la revolucion bajo la guia de aquellos lideres. 
					
					En la actualidad las nuevas generaciones que no sufrieron las pruebas de la revolucion forman el grueso de las filas revolucionarias y se presentan enormes tareas de lucha. Esta realidad demanda intensificar mas que nunca la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias.
					
					La educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias es necesaria tanto para consolidar la unidad monolitica en torno al dirigente como para adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la guia del partido. He aqui la via para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Hay que ajustar cuentas del crimen de arresto forzoso de Japon: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Hay que ajustar cuentas del crimen de arresto forzoso de Japon: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ACNC) -- Por mucho que Japon intente negar sus crimenes del pasado y tergiversar la verdad de la historia, no podra borrarlos de la memoria de la historia y la humanidad.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Ahora sobrepasa el limite la locura de los reaccionarios japoneses que niegan sus crimenes del pasado, incluso el arresto forzoso y la esclavitud sexual, y tergiversan la historia. 
					
					Ellos piensan que con sus mentiras obstinadas podrian inducir en error la opinion publica mundial y preparar el ambiente favorable a la expansion a ultramar. 
					
					Su verdadera intencion es infundir en los habitantes el resentimiento de la derrota de Japon en la segunda guerra mundial y la ambicion de nueva agresion y cultivar en ellos el espiritu de Yamato del imperialismo japones.
					
					En ese contexto, visitan el santuario Yasukuni pese a las fuertes criticas de la opinion publica mundial e insisten publicamente en rescatar el "Japon poderoso".
					
					La negacion de los crimenes del pasado y la tergiversacion de la historia significan el preludio de nueva agresion.
					
					Los paises victimas de la agresion del imperialismo japones en el siglo pasado no olvidan ni un momento los crimenes de Japon. 
					
					El pais isla debe tener correcta concepcion sobre la historia, en lugar de actuar con imprudencia abrigando ilusion sobre el resurgimiento del militarismo.
					
					Si el actual gobierno japones sigue dirigiendose a la militarizacion y la derechizacion sin arrepentirse de sus tremendos crimenes de lesa humanidad, incluso el arresto forzoso a los coreanos y la esclavitud sexual, Japon sera rechazado y repudiado como pais enemigo de la sociedad internacional.
